about_the_game:
BOATS BOATS BOATS ⛵


You step into the shoes of a master harbor manager—well, almost. Your task is to navigate a fleet of ships safely to their docks while avoiding the chaos that comes with running a bustling maritime hub.



Simply draw paths to guide each ship to its destination, ensuring smooth sailing—or as close as you can get.



But docking ships is just the start. You’ll face unexpected challenges like oil spills, drifting debris, and fishing boats. Manage the constant flow of vessels while expanding and upgrading your island into a thriving maritime empire.

Features


  • Day & Night Cycles: Navigate in light or darkness for added challenge.
  • Dynamic Weather: Fog, storms, and more keep you on your toes.
  • Diverse Fleet: Handle everything from tourist boats to cargo ships.
  • Strategic Challenges: Oil spills, debris, and fishing boats add complexity.
  • Upgrade System: Choose temporary boosts or permanent perks.
  • Multiple Modes: Play through missions or enjoy endless mode.
